body:
There is also a program distributed with Radiance called mgf2inv,  
which takes an MGF (which can be generated from Radiance using  
rad2mgf) and converts it to VRML.


You may need to dip into the ray/src/cv/mgflib directory and run  
"make mgf2inv" to create it.


-Greg
___
